column1: # "glemr6" remix - contains almost everything from revision 6 of lib_materials/lib_ecology,
#       (19th Apr 2019, dev branch). Some material of little value has been omitted. Code for
#       modifying terrain (e.g. producing lakes) has also been omitted
# The original mods were not suitable for use in survival mode, and the same applies to this remix.
#       Instead, this remix should be used as the basis for your own remixes. In particular, because
#       so many items do not actually spawn in the world, you can omit everything that is not
#       required for biomes and decorations. The section containing ore packages can also be
#       removed, as it is again not very useful in survival mode
# See the STANDARDS file for more information about what belongs in each category, and what does not
# (used in ores; can be commented out, if ores are not required)
# (other lib_materials items not used in biomes, decorations or ores; can be commented out, if not
# (NOT used as other items any more)
# (plants and other items used as decorations)
# (other lib_ecology items not used in biomes, decorations or ores; can be commented out, if not
# (NOT used as plants or other items any more)
